name: Die By The Chord
description:
March One Game A Month entry for the theme of 'Hobby'. Busy month so ran out of time to get in everything I wanted (notably a scoring system and a few extra tracks).

Hold numbers from 1-6 for the relevant chord and press Up/Down to strum, or hold the left-mouse button and use the cursor to strum. If you just want to mess around, hold down shift and use the mouse to pluck at a specific fret.

Music is from http://www.guitarbackingtrack.com/
